IMPORTANT VOCANTAS ACCESS INFORMATION

The way users access the Vocantas software is changing. Vocantas authentication protocol is changing from ADFS (Active Directory Federation Services) to SSO (Single Sign-On). 

With the more modern authentication Vocantas users will require their Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) to be set up. 

Vocantas users currently using MFA will follow their normal MFA procedures to log in effective dd/mm/yyyy.

Vocantas users who do not have MFA set up will be issued a temporary exception and will receive email communication from SNB to assist with the set up of their MFA. 

IMPORTANT: If users DO NOT setup their MFA before the exemption period runs out it will impact their ability to access Vocantas. 

Users can proceed to the new Vocantas SSO Log In by clicking the link below:

https://horizonnb-staff.vocantasonline.com/

NOTE: Please ensure that you remove any saved Vocantas favourites, shortcuts or links on your personal devices and instead save the link provided above. 

This temporary redirection page will be turned off on dd/mm/yyyy

Horizon team
